title: Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to integrate with my health-monitoring devices so that I can efficiently track my health and receive timely reminders for medication and alerts in case of emergencies.

title: Medication Management Assistance
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me when to take my medications so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence.

title: Emergency Alert System
summary: As an older adult, I want to receive immediate assistance in emergencies so that I can feel safe and secure while living independently.

title: Personalized Health Insights
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to provide me with personalized health insights so that I can manage my health efficiently and stay on top of my medication schedule.

title: Caregiver Access to Health Data
summary: As an older adult, I want my caregivers to have access to my health data so that they can help me manage my health more effectively and provide timely support when needed.

title: Daily Health Reminders
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me about my medication schedule using voice commands so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence.

title: Health History Tracking
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to keep track of my health history so that I can manage my health efficiently and share relevant information with my caregivers when needed.

title: Health Goal Setting and Tracking
summary: As an older adult, I want to set and track my health goals through simple voice commands so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence.
